answer:
Immunization schedules do vary between countries. Provide your local public health unit with a copy of your son's immunization record and they can determine any vaccines needed for him to be up-to-date on the BC schedule. Find your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Immunization schedules do vary between countries.


## Provide your local public health unit with a copy of your son's immunization record and they can determine any vaccines needed for him to be up-to-date on the BC schedule.

Find your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Hello My son was born in the U.K and we just moved to Canada. He is due for his second MMR and other vaccines in November but in B.C it said you need to be 4 years old. Do I wait
question_variation_0: how old should you be to be 4 years old
question_variation_1: how old do you have to be to be 4 years old
question_variation_2: do u have to be 4 years old for vaccines bc
